licencearea.title: LicenceArea
licencearea.description: This holds the Licence Area or DNO (Distribution Network Operator) name

gridsupplypoint.title: GridSupplyPoint
gridsupplypoint.description: This is the point of delivery from the transmission system to a distribution system

sitename.title: SiteName
sitename.description: The Name of the Site as per the UK Power Networks Control and Asset Management System

sitefunctionallocation.title: SiteFunctionalLocation
sitefunctionallocation.description: This is the Site alias in both the Network Control and Asset Management System. It includes the site number.

system_impedance_r_percent.title: System_Impedance_R_Percent
system_impedance_r_percent.description: Total system resistance at the busbars of each site

system_impedance_x_percent.title: System_Impedance_X_Percent
system_impedance_x_percent.description: Total system reactance at the busbars of each site

existing_system_fault_currents_peak_make.title: Existing_System_Fault_Currents_Peak_Make_kA
existing_system_fault_currents_peak_make.description: Peak make current for normal running conditions per site

existing_system_fault_currents_rms_break.title: Existing_System_Fault_Currents_RMS_Break_kA
existing_system_fault_currents_rms_break.description: Peak break current for normal running conditions per site

fault_rating_peak_make_ka.title: Fault_Rating_Peak_Make_kA
fault_rating_peak_make_ka.description: Maximum fault current make rating of site equipment

fault_rating_peak_break_ka.title: Fault_Rating_Peak_Break_kA
fault_rating_peak_break_ka.description: Maximum fault current break rating of site equipment
